author: shawn
msg: Fixed two minor errors in documentation.

author: shawn
msg: Fixes two issues noticed by Pierre:
* TLVs need to be aware of default evaluator class
* Expression evaluation would be skipped if the SAX provider doesn't
provide localname.  The change introduced depends on QNames being
provided (as do the rest of the TLV code), but not on 'ln' anymore.

author: shawn
msg: * Fix a minor bug in TransformSupport.  (I realized a small design flaw
in a dream I had... how sad.)
